name: Chanel Classic Flap Bag Medium
description: Iconic quilted lambskin flap bag with chain strap. Features the signature CC turn-lock closure.
care_instructions: Store in dust bag. Avoid direct sunlight. Professional cleaning recommended.
story: Created by Coco Chanel in 1955, the 2.55 bag revolutionized women's fashion.
meta_title: Chanel Classic Flap Bag Medium - Luxury Handbag
meta_description: Iconic Chanel quilted lambskin flap bag with gold chain and CC closure

name: Chanel Boy Bag Small
description: Modern interpretation of the classic flap with bold rectangular shape and chunky chain.
care_instructions: Clean with soft cloth. Store flat when not in use.
story: Inspired by Coco Chanel's love affair with Boy Capel, launched in 2011.
meta_title: Chanel Boy Bag Small - Modern Luxury Handbag
meta_description: Contemporary Chanel Boy bag in calfskin with ruthenium chain

name: Chanel Gabrielle Hobo Bag
description: Soft hobo bag with mixed textures and double chain straps. Named after Gabrielle Chanel.
care_instructions: Gentle cleaning only. Avoid water exposure.
story: Named after Gabrielle 'Coco' Chanel, embodying her free spirit.
meta_title: Chanel Gabrielle Hobo Bag - Luxury Shoulder Bag
meta_description: Chanel Gabrielle hobo bag with mixed textures and double chain straps

name: Chanel 19 Bag Large
description: Puffy quilted bag with oversized CC closure and chain handle. Modern luxury redefined.
care_instructions: Professional maintenance recommended. Store in original packaging.
story: Launched in 2019, celebrating Chanel's founding year of 1910.
meta_title: Chanel 19 Bag Large - Contemporary Luxury Bag
meta_description: Chanel 19 large bag with puffy quilting and oversized CC closure

name: Chanel Deauville Tote
description: Casual canvas tote with leather trim and iconic Chanel logo. Perfect for everyday luxury.
care_instructions: Spot clean canvas. Condition leather trim regularly.
story: Inspired by the seaside town of Deauville, where Coco opened her first boutique.
meta_title: Chanel Deauville Tote - Canvas Luxury Tote
meta_description: Chanel Deauville canvas tote with leather trim and logo detail
